reviews.name: Rayovac Type 675 Hearing Aid Batteries, 8-Pack
reviews.reviewText: It's great for hearing aids to use that batteries. They last longer about 2 months or more depend on if you wearing hearing aids everyday or sometimes. If everyday it will be less 2 months if sometimes it will be last longer than 2 months.
reviews.title: great batteries

reviews.name: Rayovac Type 675 Hearing Aid Batteries, 8-Pack
reviews.reviewText: Have been buying the 8-pack of Rayovac 675 Hearing Aid batteries from Walmart for many years, and still am very pleased with the quality and low price. These batteries last a long time. You can't go wrong with these!
reviews.title: Can't beat these Rayovac 675 Hearing Aid Batteries

reviews.name: Rayovac Type 675 Hearing Aid Batteries, 8-Pack
reviews.reviewText:
Ray o vac makes the best hearing aid batteries by far. I've tried every brand out there and nothing compares.
Great service from this web site. Good price and the convenience can't be beat!
reviews.title: Best hearing aid batteries on the market

reviews.name: Rayovac Type 675 Hearing Aid Batteries, 8-Pack
reviews.reviewText: In real time, I have bought other battery's. RayOvac have provided to last longer. That's a Fact,,, Jack!
reviews.title: Hearing Aids

reviews.name: Rayovac Type 675 Hearing Aid Batteries, 8-Pack
reviews.reviewText: My hearing aid provider provided me with my initial supply of these batteries. I like them and this is my first re-order.
reviews.title: first re-order of batteries
